tourName: Costa Rica holiday, coast to coast
placesVisited: San Jose, Southern Caribbean, Tortuguero National Park, Sarapiqui rainforest, Arenal Volcano, Monteverde, Pacific coast beach
generalInfo:
Trips to Costa Rica are invariably going to feature wildlife, activities and an incredible array of landscapes, and this 16 day tailor made Costa Rica trip is absolutely no exception.

Starting on the Caribbean coast you’ll be treated to a range of outdoor activities amongst the rainforests and along the sparkling shoreline with zip-lining through jungle canopies and snorkelling over coral reefs certainly an early highlight of any trip to Costa Rica.

Followed up with boat rides and hot springs in Tortuguero and Arenal Volcano national parks and free time in Sarapiqui rainforest and Montverde cloud forest, this Costa Rica trip really packs a punch with the Pacific coast providing the perfect destination prior to heading to San Jose to prepare for the journey home.

Unlike other Costa Rica trips this is a tailor made tour and gives you the chance to choose your own adventure with a choice of accommodation, transport and additional guided tours and exciting activities adding to the freedom of travelling under your own steam and loving every minute.

dayInfo.description: Arrive / San José. You are met on arrival and transferred to a hotel in the heart of downtown where you stay for the night (switch to a hotel in the greater San Jose area with a swimming pool if you prefer).

Southern Caribbean. a.m transfer east to the south Caribbean coast at Puerto Viejo (4 hrs) where you stay for 2 nights at a lodge set in rainforest just back from the beach. p.m free to relax on a pristine local beach or for optional activities available locally.

Southern Caribbean. Free to relax on a pristine local beach or for optional activities available locally. There are walking trails through the rainforest, you can hire bicycles, go snorkelling on the offshore coral reefs, enjoy a visit to a local indigenous community or take a cacao/chocolate tour.

Tortuguero. Early morning by road then boat to the flooded forest at Tortuguero on the northern Caribbean coast, one of the best locations for wildlife in Costa Rica. p.m visit Tortuguero village and the local beach. N.B between July and October green turtles nest on the beaches here - your lodge can help arrange turtle viewing night tours locally.
Tortuguero. Full day in Tortuguero including an excursion by boat through the narrow channels of the flooded forest for wildlife viewing (shared with others)

Sarapiquí. a.m transfer by boat and road to a local restaurant where you have lunch. If you have chosen to have a hire car you will collect it here. Travel to Puerto Viejo de Sarapiquí in the 'terra firma' lowland rainforest (1 hr) where you stay for 2 nights. Rest of the afternoon free - perhaps enjoy a rainforest night walk here this evening with chances to see nocturnal species such as snakes and frogs.

Sarapiquí. Free day to take advantage of one of the local activities such as visit OTS La Selva biological research station, one of the many reserves/natures gardens here such as Frogs Heaven or Tirimbina, pineapple plantation tours, safari river floats, river rafting
Arenal. a.m travel to Arenal, where you stay for 2 nights. Rest of the day free for local excursions such night walks in the rainforest or visit to a local hotspring complex.

Arenal. Free to relax at your hotel or enjoy the huge range of excursions on offer here including hanging bridges canopy or zipline tours, hiking, kayaking and SUP boarding on Arenal Lake, birdwatching, sloth spotting tours, mountain biking, horse-riding.
Monteverde. a.m travel up to the Monteverde cloud forest, where you stay for the next 2 nights. p.m you could visit one of the many local reserves or enjoy a coffee plantation tour.
Monteverde. You are free for your own choice of activities in the Monteverde area such as nature walks through the Santa Elena and Monteverde cloud forests, canopy walks, zip-lining and horse-riding.

Pacific coast. Travel westwards to your choice of beach destination on the Pacific coast for 3 nights e.g Tamarindo. Days 12-14: free to relax on beach or for optional excursions available locally such as surfing, kayaking, horse-riding
San José. Travel back to San José for a final positioning night.
San José / departure. Transfer to San Jose airport today to catch your onwards international flight.
